Name: Clue Mansion
Description: Based upon the classic Parker Brothers board game. Explore the mansion, question suspects, and uncover the weapon and location of Mr. Boddy's untimely demise.

Elements.Name: Hall
Elements.Description: A grand entrance with towering pillars and a sweeping staircase. The air feels heavy with formality and secrets.

default.Description: Dimly lit, with portraits of stern ancestors staring down.
default.Svg: <rect width='100' height='100' fill='#d4b483' stroke='#5a3e2b' stroke-width='2'/><text x='50' y='55' text-anchor='middle' font-size='10' fill='#3b2a1a'>Hall</text>

Elements.Name: Study
Elements.Description: A small, wood-paneled room filled with books and secrets.

default.Description: A desk littered with papers and a faint smell of cigar smoke.
default.Svg: <rect width='100' height='100' fill='#8b5a2b' stroke='#4a2e14' stroke-width='2'/><text x='50' y='55' text-anchor='middle' font-size='10' fill='#fff'>Study</text>

Elements.Name: Lounge
Elements.Description: A cozy sitting room with plush furniture and the faint aroma of brandy.

default.Description: A grand fireplace dominates the room.
default.Svg: <rect width='100' height='100' fill='#a64d79' stroke='#4a1f3d' stroke-width='2'/><text x='50' y='55' text-anchor='middle' font-size='10' fill='#fff'>Lounge</text>

Elements.Name: Library
Elements.Description: Tall shelves of dusty books line the walls.

default.Description: Smells faintly of old paper and pipe tobacco.
default.Svg: <rect width='100' height='100' fill='#4d3319' stroke='#26180a' stroke-width='2'/><text x='50' y='55' text-anchor='middle' font-size='10' fill='#fff'>Library</text>

Elements.Name: Billiard Room
Elements.Description: A room for games and gossip, with green felt tables and chalked cues.

default.Description: The cue rack stands ready, one cue slightly out of place.
default.Svg: <rect width='100' height='100' fill='#2e8b57' stroke='#145a32' stroke-width='2'/><text x='50' y='55' text-anchor='middle' font-size='9' fill='#fff'>Billiard</text>

Elements.Name: Conservatory
Elements.Description: A sunlit greenhouse filled with exotic plants.

default.Description: Birdsong echoes faintly. The air is humid.
default.Svg: <rect width='100' height='100' fill='#77dd77' stroke='#3a7d44' stroke-width='2'/><text x='50' y='55' text-anchor='middle' font-size='9' fill='#003300'>Conserv.</text>

Elements.Name: Ballroom
Elements.Description: A grand room with chandeliers and polished floors for dancing.

default.Description: Soft echoes linger as if from a long-forgotten waltz.
default.Svg: <rect width='100' height='100' fill='#add8e6' stroke='#4682b4' stroke-width='2'/><text x='50' y='55' text-anchor='middle' font-size='9' fill='#003366'>Ballroom</text>

Elements.Name: Dining Room
Elements.Description: A long mahogany table dominates the space, set for twelve.

default.Description: Candles flicker though no one lit them.
default.Svg: <rect width='100' height='100' fill='#b5651d' stroke='#4a2c10' stroke-width='2'/><text x='50' y='55' text-anchor='middle' font-size='9' fill='#fff'>Dining</text>

Elements.Name: Kitchen
Elements.Description: The scent of old cooking lingers, mingled with something metallic.

default.Description: A large range sits cold and unused.
default.Svg: <rect width='100' height='100' fill='#f2c66d' stroke='#a67c00' stroke-width='2'/><text x='50' y='55' text-anchor='middle' font-size='9' fill='#4d3900'>Kitchen</text>

Elements.Name: Mr. Boddy
Elements.Description: The unfortunate victim. Wealthy owner of Tudor Mansion, now quite deceased.

default.Description: Lying motionless. A faint smell of cologne and betrayal.
default.Svg: <circle cx='50' cy='50' r='8' fill='#999999' stroke='#333' stroke-width='1'><title>Mr. Boddy</title></circle>

Elements.Name: Professor Plum
Elements.Description: An absent-minded academic in deep purple attire, sharp of mind and tongue.

default.Description: Adjusts his spectacles nervously.
default.Svg: <circle cx='50' cy='50' r='8' fill='#800080'><title>Professor Plum</title></circle>

Elements.Name: Colonel Mustard
Elements.Description: A retired military man with a booming voice and a suspicious temper.

default.Description: He polishes his medals thoughtfully.
default.Svg: <circle cx='50' cy='50' r='8' fill='#ffcc00'><title>Colonel Mustard</title></circle>

Elements.Name: Mr. Green
Elements.Description: A nervous businessman, impeccably dressed but clearly hiding something.

default.Description: Fiddles with his tie, eyes darting about.
default.Svg: <circle cx='50' cy='50' r='8' fill='#008000'><title>Mr. Green</title></circle>

Elements.Name: Mrs. White
Elements.Description: The loyal housekeeper, stoic and silent but observant.

default.Description: Clutches a cleaning rag, eyes wary.
default.Svg: <circle cx='50' cy='50' r='8' fill='#ffffff' stroke='#ccc'><title>Mrs. White</title></circle>

Elements.Name: Miss Scarlett
Elements.Description: A glamorous socialite in a scarlet gown, always the center of attention.

default.Description: She smirks knowingly, adjusting her gloves.
default.Svg: <circle cx='50' cy='50' r='8' fill='#ff0000'><title>Miss Scarlett</title></circle>

Elements.Name: Mrs. Peacock
Elements.Description: An elegant older woman with a love for gossip and jewels.

default.Description: Her feathers of pride show in every gesture.
default.Svg: <circle cx='50' cy='50' r='8' fill='#0000ff'><title>Mrs. Peacock</title></circle>

Elements.Name: Revolver
Elements.Description: A small but deadly firearm, polished to a shine.

default.Description: A six-chamber revolver, one bullet missing.
default.Svg: <rect x='40' y='45' width='20' height='10' fill='#555' stroke='#222'/><rect x='55' y='42' width='6' height='4' fill='#999'/>

Elements.Name: Lead Pipe
Elements.Description: Heavy and blunt, it could crush more than plumbing.

default.Description: Slightly bent, cold to the touch.
default.Svg: <rect x='45' y='20' width='10' height='60' fill='#888' stroke='#333'/>

Elements.Name: Rope
Elements.Description: A sturdy length of rope, frayed at one end.

default.Description: Coiled neatly, yet ominously.
default.Svg: <circle cx='50' cy='50' r='20' fill='none' stroke='#c2b280' stroke-width='3'/>

Elements.Name: Candlestick
Elements.Description: A solid brass candlestick, elegant and heavy.

default.Description: The wax is still warm.
default.Svg: <rect x='48' y='40' width='4' height='20' fill='#c9a86a'/><circle cx='50' cy='38' r='3' fill='#f4e3b2'/>

Elements.Name: Knife
Elements.Description: A gleaming kitchen knife with a sharp edge.

default.Description: The blade catches the light, spotless—or freshly cleaned.
default.Svg: <polygon points='45,60 55,60 52,20' fill='#ccc' stroke='#444'/><rect x='45' y='60' width='10' height='5' fill='#663300'/>

Elements.Name: Wrench
Elements.Description: A heavy wrench used for tightening—or bludgeoning.

default.Description: Grease stains mark its handle.
default.Svg: <rect x='47' y='30' width='6' height='40' fill='#666'/><circle cx='50' cy='30' r='5' fill='none' stroke='#666' stroke-width='2'/>
